# Silepolis 2035 - Science Fiction in Chorz贸w

A science-fiction novel taking place in Chorz贸w, Katowice and witochowice? Actually it takes place in Silepolis in 2035  different name but exactly the same places.

## Why So?

Writing "Mirrors We Don't Have", I wanted to set this story in places somehow important to me, but that wasn't the only reason.

I wanted, through the authenticity of these places, to give readers the opportunity to feel even more strongly that such a future is probable, that it may concern us, people living here, in the cities of Silesia.

## It's Already Happening

Besides, all this is already partially happening, one way or another. Laypeople will say it's still just fantasy, but I, as someone dealing with AI for many years, know it's not.

Who has read it knows what it's about. Who hasn't read it, I invite you to [narratia.pl](http://narratia.pl)
